name: Puzzle Matcher
description:
Puzzle Matcher

A game about matching jigsaw pieces together!

PLAY IN FULLSCREEN! Otherwise the inputs might scroll the page!

How to play

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move the middle piece outwards.
Match the tabs and blanks to make sure the pieces fit!

If you connect them in the wrong way or hit the obstacles, you'll lose a point.
Use space to rescramble the pieces if there is no valid combination available.

The different pieces you connect with have unique effects. From left to right:

[no effect] [slower rotation] [faster rotation] [double points] [extra time]

       

If you run out of time, you will have to restart.

If you have trouble completing a level or want to skip to the final one, press A+Z to instantly unlock all levels!

A game by Yan Wittmann aka Skyball (programming) and Scir (art)

If a game breaking bug is discovered, I will upload a fixed version here: http://yanwittmann.de/game/GMTK2021/
